case.state: Ah! Petra! I was actually hoping to see someone like you here tonight!
A-ah! Hello, Petra! I... likewise did not expect to see you here.
Leonie? W-why would that be surprising? I... I can still have interests!
Ehm... H-Hello, Leonie... I hadn't expected you to be playing as well... But I will be doing my best, so I expect the same from you!
Er... Hello, Hilda! It... normally is not. But I think having you here can only improve things.
That is true. But I figured it would be yours, which meant it would be fun.
An opportunity to showcase my strategic prowess! I gladly accept this challenge.
While luck plays a role, tactics and repetition will be the deciding factor in this poker game.
(I'll study each card carefully and analyze my opponent's moves to secure victory.)
This game is not merely chance; it's a strategic dance of wits, and I'm ready to lead the way.
(Poker is a test of patience and calculation. I won't rush; I'll wait for the perfect moment to strike.)
Bernadetta, don't worry. I'll be here to guide you through the game, step by step. No need to panic.
Take a deep breath, Bernadetta. We'll play together, and I'll ensure you won't be overwhelmed.
Petra? Is poker something they play in Brigid? Either way, I'm sure you're going to pick it up quickly.
I don't have to tell you to be confident at a game like this, do I, Petra?
(Hilda's here? I know she has my back, but I don't want to be treated like I'm naive...)
You might surprise us all if you put in some effort, Hilda. I won't underestimate you. And I don't think anyone else should, either.
Ignatz, your art skills might help you read expressions, but don't forget to trust your instincts too.
Ignatz? I'm glad you're working on your self-confidence, but don't expect me to baby you.
Leonie! I'm sure with your instincts and history, you'd be great at this! Just don't go easy on me!
So... is this where you've been sneaking off to, Leonie? I was worried you were brooding.
Hrm. I see where Petra's loyalties lie.
H-Hey! Petra, don't go! I am plenty of fun to play with!
W-Well! That stops one of us from embarrassing ourselves, I suppose.
L-Leonie? But... I was excited to play with you...
(Oh... It's mostly men tonight... That's interesting. Will I be the center of attention... or simply be content to watch the game unfold?)
(Just venturing a guess, but I get the feeling the competition isn't going to be stiff. Or are they?)
(I suppose if it's all men, I'm walking away with my curiosity more than satisfied...)
(I'm not sure I'm in the right place... Unless I just want to watch... May as well keep going. Just to see if it gets interesting. )

(I can watch, and ask a lot of questions... but am I really in the right game? Though... Perhaps watching how men engage each other might allow me to be more firm in my own pursuits, should I choose them.)
(Hm... We're all somewhat... less endowed, aren't we?)
I... Er... So... we're not including anyone from outside the House?
If... it's just us... this is rather intimate, isn't it?
Surely the Professor didn't construe this as team-building?
(Only women...? I... Suppose it is less pressure than doing this with men...)
(Just girls...? Well, I suppose that's not the worst thing.)
(I was hoping that I'd have more variety, but I suppose when you have no experience, it's all variety...)
If you go easy on me, you're going to lose.
I assure you, I won't hold back.
Let's begin. (Let's see if I can't acquire bit of experience at the end of the night.)
(Let's make this interesting!)
~Cards.text~.
Three. W-wait, ~cards.text~! Different ones!
Be patient, we're not in a rush, are we?
(What is everyone else exchanging?)
(What did everyone play last round...?)
Just so you know, I could count cards. But that would not be very fair of me, would it?
Hm... ~cards.text~...
My hand is formidable, and my strategy impeccable.
It appears fortune favors me.
Good luck is simply capitalizing on what you see.
(Would the mature thing be to play it cool, or show off?)
In Fódlan, there are an abundance of tomes and circulars which describe proper behavior. Which is to say, my cards are excellent. And as such, I wished to be gracious in telling you.
A shame we are not putting more than our dignity on the line...
I must admit that this game is rather more thrilling than simply reading about intimate matters.
It is hard work to be skilled at anything. I won't take any given hand for granted.
If you're becoming distracted already... I suppose that's rather flattering. Thank you.
Do not let my appearance fool you. I am one of the greatest mages of my generation, and it is entirely due to my efforts.
It is true that I would rather not lose...
Such conflicting feelings. And sensations.
Frankly, the glances you send my way have me a mix of pleased and maybe a bit concerned. You do like my appearance, right?
Not that I'd wish to have every intimate moment of my life begin this way... but striving a bit does make it more enjoyable.
I never get the opportunity to... Learn like this at home. But do not mistake this for an interest in getting hands-on!
Not enough to win with any certainty...
I'm not giving up now.
(~Player~ keeps looking my way. Am I distracting ~player.ifMale(him|her)~? That's almost better than winning!)
(I feel so tense... So... pent up.)
I am a noble of marriageable age. Please do enjoy that this sight is deliberately rare.
(My hand's not extraordinary... But I can trust someone has a worse one.)
I can hold my own with this. But I can hold my own with a lot of things.
I've done what I can.
(The odds aren't in my favor here...)
At Garreg Mach, we prefer games of strategy, not mere chance.
(I have to think harder, next time.)
There's only one person who wins, right? Maybe it's better to think of it as only one of us doesn't lose...
Games of chance are really just games of probability. And I'm probably not going to lose.
It is hard to feel shame about losing when everyone's still looking my way. So... thank you?
I wonder how many dynasties have risen or fallen as the result of inflamed passions... Surely more than one, at least back in Fódlan ...
(At this point, there is plenty more for me to think about than cards.)
It's been fun playing with me, hasn't it?
Um... G-given where the game is going, you need not practice overmuch discretion... In looking at my figure.
I don't have time to be embarrassed, or coy!
Tch. Do not think that House Ordelia retains its status by so easily giving up.
Is this truly my greatest showing...? I'm showing my greatest, I guess.
There's hardly any value in a game like this if I never lose...
The odds aren't in my favor here... but I'm not giving up.
Things look grim, but I'm not one to give up easily.
(By playing conservatively and observing my opponents closely, I might find a path to success...)
...I cannot be expected to always be right, can I? Even if it feels that way at home...
Don't be so pleased with yourselves. I was bound to lose at some point.
(Even if I'd kept that card instead of the one I picked... I'd still be stuck with this hand.) *Sigh*
(As much as I hate losing, at least I know people will be seeing me as I want to be seen.)
If I lose, you are welcome to look. But don't leer, or do anything strange!
Drat. Claude owes me a meal when I return. His strategy is an utter failure. Though perhaps his strategy was to coerce me into dinner.
This is-- You cannot be serious! I want a do-over!
W-when you say it like that... Um... Yes.
I--I am having the sense that... It may be rather childish of me to not have groomed further. G-given the... *ahem* the absolute state of your... your pussy! There's no hair! Was that expected?
I am fully aware that I'm not well-endowed. My brain rather than my breasts received the most development.
If you are going to stare, at least do so in a way that's more obvious regarding your intentions.
(Am I being too forward? Not forward enough?)
I-It's the first time anyone has seen me naked in a context like this. M-Might you please at least flatter me a little?
I'm... happy that I can appeal to some of you, regardless. I want to make the most of to~background.time~.
I'm often in quite the hurry for things. But... romance, or... even just an encounter like this... Ah, forgive the sentimentality.
Wanting these things is normal. And I'm not used to being normal, I guess.
I-- Ehm... While that is... Are you implying something about the... later stages of the game?
Your advice helped a lot, you know. But I am glad you approve!
I am still quite a powerful ball of magical might. But yes, it does feel good to veritably tower over you. In a few ways, anyway.
I-- Ehm... I was not expecting such a straightforward compliment.
I wore something I already owned, that was comfortable and suitable. What exactly about it is immature?
I'm not being especially serious.
It's a game, but it doesn't mean I want to treat it lightly.
Why, yes. Strategy and tactics are a core part of our curriculum, as are magic and diplomacy.
Diplomacy, strategy, and tactics are the core of our studies. But I focus on my magic.
Excuse me?
In a way, Jura, I'm just glad you noticed. My hair wasn't always like this.
Erm, Jura... did you mention... cake? Will Barnette be bringing cake, later?
Just because I have swung a blade a few times does not-- I-it is far more efficient to simply use magic!
That is true, Meia. But that is all the more reason to study and control it.
You can already tell that I have a Crest? You are very perceptive... but no, it aids my magic. The rest of it comes from me.
...Yeah. It would've been nice. To be normal, and to... have gotten to spend more time with friends like you, sooner.
I am perfectly relaxed. I simply do not wish to entirely divest myself of any tactical advantages!
Well, thank you. Even if we have different tastes, I do admire the way you've done your hair, and the way your outfit comes together. Did you design it yourself? Mine is... somewhat custom.
I am not attending the game for that purpose. (Or, not exclusively...)
And what is that supposed to be?
Yes, exactly. That is why it is critical to be ever focused, and insistent on pursuing one's goals, Yuno. And do not slack on your sleep.
No, you are correct, Nonon. Am I to assume this is an activity in which you partake? As for my reasoning...
That statement is... eerie in its statement. How in Seiros's name could you possibly know that?
Besides my mother, there aren't any. This is uniquely my... appearance.
Perhaps it's a result of your own personality, if you are finding yourself dealing with it often.
Well excuse me if I want to make a concerted effort of this.
I'm not a witch. I'm a mage. Witches are untrained charlatans or blood sacrificing idiots.
I-I can get a date! I-I am Lysithea von Ordelia! I can count the suitors I've had on-- Y-you!
I think we could. At very least, I imagine that you and I have quite a bit in common, Natsuki.
To undress? Obviously. Have you not been paying attention, Cheryl?
How so, Cheryl? I am hard pressed to find similarities.
My type? In terms of... The qualities I wish that an ideal partner would possess? Do you have time to idly wonder about such things? Staring off into the distance while imagining--
Like you'd understand... Actually... If anyone could understand...
E-Excuse me? I am not creepy!
T-That would be an ideal outcome, perhaps. But certainly not with someone whose first attempt at exciting me is to belittle me for my origins.
Why, yes, Sucrose. But I am not quite sure how you arrived at that conclusion so swiftly...
I would hope not, though I will admit I do not prioritize idle chatter when I have much to do...
While I am a mage... Hm. I suppose those things would be more interesting to alchemists... But I primarily focus on offensive magic, not necessarily specific types.
Of course I'm not-- They don't exist! W-whatever else going on in this game is-- I-it's secondary!
Must you draw attention to that? Talent or not, I aim to use my time to the fullest.

I primarily focus on offensive spells. Defeating an enemy before they can strike is far superior than mending wounds. Though I am also quite skilled in White Magic as well as all schools of Anima and Dark.
"Roleplay...?" Is that not where you dress up as... Are you insulting my sorcery?
*Ahm...* Yes. I am. It was not by choice.
Well, yes. That is what I have alluded to the entire time we have been playing this. I can at least show that I'm skilled at cards.
You are correct, Dunban. Life is far too short to simply spend it frivolously.
I am glad you seemed to have paid more attention after I rebuked you. I do not feel it is a good use of my time to not be disciplined.
Is that supposed to be a compliment or an insult?
Why, yes, Mia. I'm a student at the Garreg Mach Officer's Academy. I am there to learn tactics and hone my skills as a mage.
I do not wish to be rude, but my studies are my primary focus. I do enjoy a bit of baking, or reading for pleasure, but those are rare treats.
I am skilled at magic! But my skills come from my hard work, not some arbitrary talent!
I... I have very specific goals I wish to accomplish, yes. But they will all require concerted, deliberate effort, not idle dreaming.
You're-- Ugh! But it's so tedious! All that effort for such little gain...!
Er... I'm not sure what you mean, Petra... Y-you are not implying anything... lewd, are you?
Nonsense! While there is plenty of mathematical theory, it is like saying that you cannot learn to sing or play an instrument because your mathematical mind is lacking, Petra!
I... Thank you, Petra. You cannot imagine how gratifying it is to hear that my passion for magic is the result of dedicated study!
Hmph. You do not need to flatter me for its own sake. I rarely dress up, and things like makeup are beyond me... Is there something else you wish to say, Petra?
I-I-- W-wait just a moment! What are you implying? I do not know what you are talking about-- Thank you?
It is a strategic necessity. You are not fully independent in a battle, are you?
W-well... I do think that... Ehm... It would be easier to show rather than... say.
There are only so many minutes in the day. Being punctual makes sure you make the most of them.
L-Leonie! Don't embarrass me. I'm not simply going to pass out from-- from a bit of nudity!
I do. I take pride in doing whatever I am doing to the utmost, Leonie.
Um. W-well... I'm not sure I have time for some kind of great romance...
It is strange that you think that would be such a problem for me, Leonie... Do I give off that impression?
Yes. I am from House Ordelia, a member of Leicester Alliance. I'm glad my outfit has made an impression.
I endeavor to do the best at anything I attempt. But winning trivially is not valuable for getting what I want from this game.
A... "ghost" pepper? As if I'd fall for something so childish... As for my complexion...
I am quite skilled with magic. But you do not strike me as a mage, or at least not one like me. How can you tell?
I do rather enjoy tea. Something sweet, with plenty of gentle fragrances and flavors is my favorite. Why do you ask?
Ahem. Simply knowing the value of my modesty does not diminish my ability to lose that modesty.
And you would consider this the pinnacle of balance, no doubt.
Why, I think baking is something I rather enjoy, but I would not consider myself a particular expert... but I would happily show you! Are there flavors or textures you like?
Ah... well. It's embarrassing to admit, but our logistics officers are not too incorrect when they assert that soldiers win battles while logistics win wars...
It is... Ah... Yes. A chance to affirm myself. Or, I suppose a chance for... Others to show they do find me appealing, as a woman.
If you are going to compliment me, please do so without caveats. Or you will see me grumpy and indignant.
I think I understand what you are implying, Jura. But there is a difference between poor circumstance and a definite end. I can do everything right, and still not have much longer to go...
I... Yes. As long as it is a genuine compliment, I would like to receive it.
Given that I intended to dissolve my house... There are fewer problems with descent. Therefore, my own interests included, it would not be strictly necessary to have a male spouse...
Oh. I... That is very astute. I am a bit ashamed that you seem to have realized that before me, even.
*Ehrm*... I have... But...
I suppose it would be obvious to a physician, so there is little sense in being upset or lying. I do. Why do you ask?
I would be quite happy to instruct you. But the practice is rather simple: Study your opponent, study your allies, and apply your assets where the enemy is weak!
It is my house. Does your school not sort associated people together?
My type... I think... Someone with the confidence to make great changes. And... Perhaps with the grace to make the most of what time we would have together.

It is actually rather hard to say... I have really only seen him across the room. The one time I did get close to him, he told my parents that the warfare he was speaking of was rather inappropriate for a child...
I-I do not know what you are speaking about... W-what do you think I have juicy information on? S-surely not anything about the kitchens...
I have sufficiently exhausted textbooks for that which I seek, Reimu.
Excuse you! Do not think that because I am undressing you can simply call me fragile! And no, clearly my home is not a utopia or I would not be here.
Of course I do. But that doesn't mean it's something I can do.
I-I... *Ahem* Yes. I... Yes. I do. Very clearly. Are... are you wondering what those things might be out of courtesy, or... interest?
What are you trying to say? If anything dangerous comes within my range of vision, I can usually dispense with it. If we withdraw, it is because our front ranks have fallen...
Of course I did. It would hardly be an enjoyable game were people not to see and appreciate me as well. If I simply wanted to watch others... W-well, I have my ways.
Lysithea's hair isn't naturally this color, and she doesn't get much sunlight.
While she's not a big proponent of physical labor, she's certainly fine with intimate acts, to a special someone
Lysithea gets annoyed when her skill is attributed to talent, rather than work
Lysithea is very strong at magic, particularly dark magic.
In terms of intimate experiences, Lysithea hasn't even kissed someone, so much of her understanding of sex and the like is mechanical or through hearsay.
Lysithea loves sweets.
She doesn't like being treated like a child or like she needs to be protected.
FE3H's magic is based on a system of "Crests". Lysithea is unique in that she has two.
While she's a noble, Lysithea is of a minor house.
I'm still ahead, but I feel it would be dishonest not to explain my intentions...
While I am winning and do not wish to bring the mood down, I feel it's an appropriate time to say why I am here that is not going to be viewed as an attempt at sympathy...
I suppose it is only fair...
I was thinking you'd have put up more of a fight. Oh well.
You'll surely see much more of me if you keep it up... but I'm not worried for now.
Perhaps if you took more time to think and less time staring at the others, you'd see even more of me.
While I do want to keep things interesting... I... er... I can still be a bit shy...
While the view may not change much, I hope you enjoy the process.
Results aren't everything, are they? Though... if getting me closer to seeing me naked is the result you want...
It became obvious that I never was going to be very... chesty.
I think it was Dorothea who said that a chest that's small enough to fill your hand is more than enough to fill someone's heart...
If I might be so bold as to suggest that as close as this game is, we could-- *Ahem*.
*Ahem*. Given how close the game is, there's... ah... um... N-never mind! Just look!
Provided you are still interested in seeing more of me...
I was worried I'd simply be standing here awkwardly...
You'll surely see much more of me if you keep it up... but I'm not worried for now.
Perhaps if you took more time to think and less time staring at the others, you'd see even more of me.
While I do want to keep things interesting... I... er... I can still be a bit shy...
I wish to be honest, but I do not wish for anyone to believe I am speaking in a play for sympathy.
Before the game progresses too much further, I have something that I wish to say. I request that you do not use that information as a means to treat me gently.
I am glad we are keeping the competition close.
Ah... it should be fairly obvious what I'm choosing, shouldn't it?
My first loss. Do not overmuch expect me to fluster.
Well played. But just because I lost doesn't mean I must do exactly what you wish!
Hm. You are not expecting me to simply fall all over myself, are you?
I have plenty of plays left to make before you... ah... get to know me.
In battle, it does not often take much to test my durability. Forgive me for enjoying the ability to stay standing a little longer.
My tights generally help me move and... were an extra layer.
I know you can already see my panties, but... perhaps you'll still enjoy me removing these?
Here I go...
So it's come to this... or... these.
Is... there a particular way this is done?
I'm... I'm normally quite perfunctory about this. Is that acceptable?
I am not a performer, so do not expect some grand reveal...
*Sigh* I suppose it is only fair...
Though I was not in a hurry to get here, I obviously did not come here expecting... Ah, anything less...
Tch. How troublesome! I didn't expect to be behind this early!
I'm not a child. I know the consequences for a defeat. Even if this one was due to my own failings...
Tch. I still have plenty of options.
Fine! If you're so interested in seeing me lose, just know that I am quite the fast learner!
Ah... It is a good thing I took this seriously, and wore more than the bare minimum.
Overconfidence leads to insidious defeats. It is a good thing that my assessment of things is usually accurate.
The utility of an extra layer that does not deny you a view seems an acceptable compromise.
I wear these tights mostly for comfort. But it seems I could use the extra layer...
I'm quite aware that I'm not well-endowed. If you're going to be rude about it, I'm more than happy to show you that my magical skills make up for it in spades.
Erm... Fine. It would not make sense to draw this out any further.
To bare myself fully in these circumstances...
Hmph. I didn't come here expecting to stay dressed, after all.
Though I expected and prepared for this, it feels strange to be losing.
I'd be a poor sport if I wasn't somewhat excited by this, but don't you for a second think that I will continue being bested in this fashion!
Ah! Wonderful. I suppose in truth, I wanted to make sure I could measure up to your example, as odd as that is to say in most contexts...
Let me have this! After years of being called all manner of dismissive names designed to coddle me, at least let me have this!
I... I can see the value in your perspective. But... You do not find this... This way of socializing to be strange? It somehow feels different than simply being in the sauna at night...
Thank you, Dunban. It is a lot to bear... but it is something that I must do.
W-Wait a minute, I didn't say that! ~fe~! J-Just because we are playing the same game does not mean I planned to play together!
I believe there is an expression of the night sky asking the cave how it deals with all its darkness.
Hahaha... Please! Tell me about it. But I'm fine getting a date. I just... Um... Have other priorities.
I will be reserving my opinions until I have gotten to know the rest of you. Do not mistake this... This... Person's words for the truth!
I am choosing to enjoy myself as I wish. To me, this is fun. I see no reason to simply laze through the game.
I am having fun. I simply do not see much point in being frivolous with one's efforts or time.
You seem to have a rather keen eye and sharp wit. Perhaps, if you focused on it, you could learn quite a bit more from some manner of formal education.
Tch. Do you find this tactic often successful? Attempting to reduce someone's self-esteem in hopes of getting them to do what you want?
That... Is not so different from my own experiences, Meia. If you ever wish to talk about it, I would be happy to lend a familiar ear.
It's more like the magic went right... It was an experiment. And not one I volunteered for.
Like cake? It's one of my favorite things. Er. In a classy, refined way of enjoying it.
How hard could it possibly be? You simply put the blade where your opponent's is not, and failing to do that, you put yours in a position where their attack cannot kill you.
Excuse me? I am not desperate, simply hurried.
Thank you. But I still wish to learn, and do so much more. As long as I have the time to learn, I must have the will, as well!
What are you implying? Of course I do not normally risk exposing myself over a game of cards... Don't you?
I-- How did you...?
Is it truly so strange? How does magic work in your world?
You did not answer my-- But... Yes? I work quite hard for my accomplishments. You are very perceptive, Sucrose. (If somewhat strange.)
What is it, Sucrose? Could you stop stuttering and get to whatever point it is you intend to make?
Aha! So that is how it is. Have you been working up the courage to ask that for the entire game?
You cannot possibly be serious. Now? Of all times?
...My... Ah. *Ahem*. Yes. I see we are truly aligned in that regard. Though you are so much more... Colorful with your words.
It is a rather long and sad story. But in short, I was experimented on. I was the only success... But at a high price.
Well, be grateful that you have the time to play games. I... suppose that I am playing this one...
I... Honestly, it has never occurred to me that there was an option to not want my magic. Especially after all the hours I've poured into it...
Thank you, but I know my own limits. And how to keep pushing them without succumbing.
As for the reason... Well... the results on the battlefield speak for themselves. And... I hope to... Better understand Crests, you might say.

I would say that you should continue to focus... But perhaps if you thought of it more like landing a blow with a sword, or hitting a target with an arrow, you might find more success. In terms of how to shape the words and align the sigils, anyway.
I suppose I wish to ensure a safe future for my family. Even if I perish, I want them to be safe. I also wish to contribute to Fódlan's understanding of Crests. I dream mostly about that.
*Er-ah-ehm.* I-I can speak far more to magic than... My "cuteness."
You're serious? You think I am truly elegant...? I... Suppose Hilda and Marianne have indeed provided quite the help, if it is enough to convince you, Petra.
I suppose we are alike in that way, as well. But... I obviously would like some practical experience to go with the legacy.
I... I actually would really enjoy that. I think Marianne's underwear is always incredibly pretty when we're changing between battles. T-though I'm not being lewd.
These are not new arguments to me... but perhaps having space to think, that also can improve my endurance...
I find it frustrating when things do not happen when I might hope, so I would not wish to put someone else in that position.
I would not want to break anyone's heart... Erm. In a less presumptive way, I suppose I did want some experience before I miss opportunities that I'd regret...
I admire your ability to have so many competing interests. Plus, if you got much stronger, you might actually prove very distracting!
Exactly. I control my own fate. I want to do everything in my power to make certain I have left the impact that I want, and protected my family.
Thank you for the apology. Take care not to repeat the mistake. It is tiresome to have your efforts ascribed to...
It truly is, but theory means very little if you do not put it into practice. Which is to say that training, or actually fighting, is how I hone my best spells.
It can be. It is a bit like magic, but for the hungry.
Tch. I'll have you know-- Why is it that everyone must imply my achievements are not due to my own hard work? Of course I study hard. But it is not wealth that enables me to do so!
Certainly. One must be able to stand on her own, but it is rarely about any one of us.
I was actually going to say my hips. I am rather proud of my ability to strike an imposing stance. Though the compliment about my legs is appreciated.

It is a relatively small country, full of individual houses and landed gentry. But it is very much an alliance. Even if we have a leader, it is mostly due to connections of trade and mutual defense that we act together...
Well, ah.. Ehrm... Practical experience. In this... manner of thing. I believe that we are similar in that regard?
Ehrm... I think you and I might be looking for quite different outcomes and investments, Meia...
I... What do you mean by that? I am quite unused to being complimented on my physique, but I am more curious than guarded...
I'm not against the prospect of a feminine partner. But I have always preferred men.
That's so annoying! If I'm giving someone trouble, I want them to... Hm. Maybe... *Ahm...* Maybe I do like that...
W-well... I think I am here for one obvious objective...

Nominally, based on nation of origin. But there's many people who move between Houses or classes. Your House also determines which professor is responsible for the core of your teachings. There are many philosophical differences when it comes to warfare.
~wh~, does your hair look dark like mine? Um. Below the belt? My hair color wasn't always white, but... I never had the occasion to ask.
~wh~... Does your hair also look like mine? Er. Underneath your underwear? I... don't know anyone else in the same situation as me.
My magic does come from my hard work, but I can give credence to the idea that my two Crests-- let me be blunt.
While I do have two crests, you should be aware my skills are a product of my efforts -- Er, to be direct...
Is it true that some women shave it bare, or with designs...?
Normally, I simply trim a bit for my own comfort...
I hope that my small concession to vanity does not imply other things about me...
The jewelry is not anything particularly special... but I did enjoy dressing up.
I do not often have cause or reason to dress up. Makeup, fancy clothes... it all seems so... frivolous!
I prefer to let my actions speak for themselves. But... I did enjoy dressing up for this. Just a bit.
I... would not be opposed to compliments. As the youngest in my class, I do so tire of being ignored.
I rarely... um, get much attention paid to my looks. I... do you think the way I did these looks pretty?
If you want to play with someone who would expose her underwear to distract you, play with someone else.
